ISSUE.TITLE: Feature: ability to rearrange the order of pending jobs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Enabling users to drag & drop the pending jobs would be nice. Currently, it has to be done by cancel & restart. Use scenario: Say, prioritizing release builds over casual development CI builds in the long queue.
